schemes.title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
schemes.description: PM-KISAN is a central sector scheme launched on 24th February 2019 to supplement financial needs of land holding farmers, subject to exclusions. Under the scheme, financial benefit of Rs. 6000/- per year is transferred in three equal four-monthly installments into the bank accounts of farmers' families across the country, through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) mode.
schemes.benefits: Rs. 6000/- per year in three equal installments
schemes.achievements: Rs. 2.81 lakh crores transferred through DBT to more than 11 crores beneficiaries

schemes.title: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
schemes.description: MGNREGA is a flagship scheme launched in 2005 to provide at least 100 days of guaranteed wage employment in a financial year to rural households whose adult members volunteer to do unskilled manual work.
schemes.benefits: 100 days of wage employment per year for rural households
schemes.achievements: Generated 389 crore person-days of work in FY 2022-23

schemes.title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
schemes.description: Launched in 2014, PMJDY is a national mission for financial inclusion to ensure access to financial services, including a basic savings bank account, credit, insurance, and pension.
schemes.benefits: Zero balance accounts, overdraft facility, and RuPay debit card
schemes.achievements: Over 49 crore accounts opened with a total balance exceeding Rs. 1.97 lakh crores

schemes.title: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY)
schemes.description: PMJAY is the world's largest health assurance scheme launched in 2018 to provide health coverage of up to Rs. 5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
schemes.benefits: Health coverage of up to Rs. 5 lakh per family per year
schemes.achievements: Over 24 crore Ayushman cards issued, 5 crore hospital treatments worth Rs. 60,000 crore provided

schemes.title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
schemes.description: Launched in 2016, PMUY aims to safeguard the health of women and children by providing free LPG connections to BPL households.
schemes.benefits: Free LPG connections with first refill and stove
schemes.achievements: Over 9 crore LPG connections provided under the scheme
